AttributeDefinition.name: Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Full Name of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: UserID
AttributeDefinition.Description: User Id of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: SystemLoginID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Login Id of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: UserAlias
AttributeDefinition.Description: User Alias

AttributeDefinition.name: StartDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Start date of the user account

AttributeDefinition.name: IsPasswordChangeRequired
AttributeDefinition.Description: Password Change Required Flag

AttributeDefinition.name: EndDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: End date of the user account

AttributeDefinition.name: IsActive
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether this User is allowed to log into Epic

AttributeDefinition.name: IsBlocked
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether this User is blocked from logging into Epic

AttributeDefinition.name: BlockReason
AttributeDefinition.Description: The reason why the User account is blocked

AttributeDefinition.name: BlockComment
AttributeDefinition.Description: A freetext comment about why the User is blocked

AttributeDefinition.name: DefaultLoginDepartmentID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of default login department

AttributeDefinition.name: AuthenticationConfigurationID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authentication Configuration

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedProviderID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Linked Provider Id of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: DefaultLinkedTemplateID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The default linkable template for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedTemplateID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Linked template Id of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedTemplateConfig
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of LinkedTemplateConfig objects pointing to the template setup for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedSubtemplateIDs
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Linked Subtemplate Ids

AttributeDefinition.name: InBasketClassifications
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of InBasketClassification Id's

AttributeDefinition.name: UserRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: User Roles

AttributeDefinition.name: ExternalIdentifiers
AttributeDefinition.Description: External identifiers are specifically used to allow a lightweight way to manage user identity in multiple systems

AttributeDefinition.name: CustomUserDictionaries
AttributeDefinition.Description: Custom dictionaries allow users to maintain their own spellcheck corrections

AttributeDefinition.name: Notes
AttributeDefinition.Description: Freetext notes about this User

AttributeDefinition.name: ContactDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date the User was created. Defaults to the current date if not provided

AttributeDefinition.name: ContactComment
AttributeDefinition.Description: A comment associated with the most recent revision of the User's record

AttributeDefinition.name: UserDictionaryPath
AttributeDefinition.Description: The file path at which custom user dictionary files can be found

AttributeDefinition.name: LDAPOverrideID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A string that can be provided to identify the User to the LDAP server in place of the SystemLogin

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportGrouper1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportGrouper2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportGrouper3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: UserPhotoPath
AttributeDefinition.Description: A URL or file path to a picture of this user

AttributeDefinition.name: Sex
AttributeDefinition.Description: The User's legal sex, typically. Valid values include the Male, Female, Unknown

AttributeDefinition.name: ProviderAtLoginOption
AttributeDefinition.Description: How shall the User be prompted to choose an associated provider upon login

AttributeDefinition.name: ForceContactCreation
AttributeDefinition.Description: If true, the provided values will be filed to a new "contact" for the User, meaning that previous values will be retained

AttributeDefinition.name: EmployeeDemographics
AttributeDefinition.Description: This parameter is used to provide certain specific information about the user

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper4
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper5
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper6
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_AcademicTitle
AttributeDefinition.Description: Academic title of the user. e.g. Phd, MD, Dr, DDS, DD etc.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_FatherName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's father's name, typically used for constructing Arabic names

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_FirstName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The first or given name of the User

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_GivenNameInitials
AttributeDefinition.Description: Initials for the first name

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_GrandfatherName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's grandfather's name, typically used for constructing Arabic names

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_LastName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's last or family name

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_LastNamePrefix
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's last name prefix

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_PrimaryTitle
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary title of the user. e.g Mr., Miss, Dr., Ms. etc.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_SpouseLastName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last, or family name of the user's spouse

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_SpouseLastNameFirst
AttributeDefinition.Description: "Yes" or "No." If "Yes", the spouse's last name will appear first in the hyphenated last name

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_SpousePrefix
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's spouse prefix

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_Suffix
AttributeDefinition.Description: Suffix of user e.g. Sr., Jr., I, II, III

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_WebExternalIdentifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: The external system Login ID

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_ReceiveExternalEmail
AttributeDefinition.Description: This controls whether users receive notification emails from EpicCare link

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_ReceiveGroupNotifications
AttributeDefinition.Description: This controls whether users receive group notification emails from EpicCare link

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_Deactivated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Signifies a user should no longer have access to the application

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_SiteManagerContexts
AttributeDefinition.Description: This links users to EpicCare Link user context groups for the purposes of site management

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_UserContexts
AttributeDefinition.Description: This links users to EpicCare Link user context groups

AttributeDefinition.name: UserGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: The current list of User Groups for the selected user

AttributeDefinition.name: BIDefaultUser
AttributeDefinition.Description: The BI default user name for the Hyperspace user, which is used by Hyperspace to connect to BI applications

AttributeDefinition.name: EmailAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email address of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: PhoneNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: Phone number of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: FaxNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: Fax number of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: UpdateLinkedProviderRecord
AttributeDefinition.Description: Update linked provider record flag

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_City
AttributeDefinition.Description: City of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_Country
AttributeDefinition.Description: Country of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_County
AttributeDefinition.Description: County of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_District
AttributeDefinition.Description: District of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_HouseNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: House number of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_Lines
AttributeDefinition.Description: Lines of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_State
AttributeDefinition.Description: State of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_ZipCode
AttributeDefinition.Description: Zip code of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: PreferredLoginDepartments
AttributeDefinition.Description: The departments on the user's preferred list

AttributeDefinition.name: LoginDepartmentFilterList
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of departments to use when limiting access for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: LoginDepartmentFilterSetting
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether the Department Filter List is Inclusive or Exclusive

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedServiceAreas
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of service areas for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedLocations
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of locations for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedDepartments
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of Departments for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedDepartmentGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of department groups for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedUsers
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of users for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedProviders
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of providers for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedTemplateID
AttributeDefinition.Description: ID of the Linked template

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedTemplateName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the Linked template

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedSubtemplateIDs
AttributeDefinition.Description: ID of the Linked Sub template

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedSubTemplateName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the Linked Sub template

AttributeDefinition.name: Number
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of the InBasket Classification

AttributeDefinition.name: Title
AttributeDefinition.Description: Title of the InBasket Classification

AttributeDefinition.name: Abbreviation
AttributeDefinition.Description: Abbreviation of the InBasket Classification

AttributeDefinition.name: ExternalID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The external ID of department

AttributeDefinition.name: Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the department

AttributeDefinition.name: Location
AttributeDefinition.Description: Location of the department

AttributeDefinition.name: Service Area
AttributeDefinition.Description: Service Area of the department

AttributeDefinition.name: Center
AttributeDefinition.Description: Center of the department

AttributeDefinition.name: Specialty
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specialty of the department

Field.name: ContactComment
Field.value: Epic account created by SailPoint Identity Management.
